long_description: Built for adventures that last from dusk til dawn, the Tifosi Duro interchangable sunglasses feature interchangable lenses ready for any condition. Frame includes 3 sets of lenses (gray with red finish, gray and clear tints) that accommodate bright light, low-medium light and nighttime conditions. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to help eliminate fogging. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit, flexibility and impact-resistance in all temperatures. Hydrophilic rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Fits medium to large faces. Tifosi Duro interchangable sunglasses include a semirigid zippered storage case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: Built for adventures that last from dusk til dawn, the Tifosi Duro interchangable sunglasses feature interchangable lenses ready for any condition.
